rules.fullName: Channel Partner Has Not Acted on Lead %E2%80%93 10 Days
rules.description: Notifies Channel Partner to change the lead status from MQL to SAL after 10 days from lead creation.

rules.fullName: Channel Partner Has Not Acted on Lead %E2%80%93 4 Days
rules.description: Notifies Channel Partner to change the lead status from MQL to SAL after 4 days from lead creation.

rules.fullName: Channel Partner Has Not Acted on Lead %E2%80%93 7 Days
rules.description: Notifies Channel Partner to change the lead status from MQL to SAL after 7 days from lead creation.

rules.fullName: Channel Partner Has Not Updated Lead Status %E2%80%93 30 Days
rules.description: Notifies Channel Partner if the lead status has not been updated to SQL after 30 days from lead creation.

rules.fullName: Channel Partner Has Not Updated Lead Status %E2%80%93 60 Days
rules.description: Notifies Channel Partner if the lead status has not been updated to SQL after 60 days from lead creation.

rules.fullName: Channel Partner Has Not Updated Lead Status %E2%80%93 90 Days
rules.description: Notifies Channel Partner if the lead status has not been updated to SQL after 90 days from lead creation.
Notifies Channel Partner of new lead assignment

rules.fullName: Convert Lead to Opportunity within 2 days
rules.description: Task to be created to lead owner to convert lead to opportunity upon lead qualification within 2 days
Send Email to Master Data Admin to create new account and create a task for data admin to create new Account.

rules.fullName: Create Account Email and Task For BGA
rules.description: Send Email to Master Data Admin to create new account and create a task for data admin to create new Account for the BGA.
To trigger follow up mails to Lead owner.

criteriaItems.value: GTO Business Admin (US),GTO Business Admin (Non US),GTO DS FSE (Non US),GTO DS FSE (US),GTO FSE (Non US),GTO FSE (US),GTO FSE/PSE/CSPM (Non US),GTO FSE/PSE/CSPM (US),GTO FSE/PSE/CSPM/FT/EIS(RE) (Non US),System Administrator

rules.fullName: Email Notification for AOG%2FCritical Business need
Email Notification for a new BGA Honeywell ILOW Case
rules.formula: AND( ISNEW(), ISPICKVAL( LeadSource , "ILOW Case"), RecordTypeId =$Label.BGA_Honeywell_Prospect )

rules.fullName: Email Notification to Lead owner when Lead is not converted after 30 days

criteriaItems.value: Marketing Qualified Leads (MQL),Sales Accepted Leads (SAL),Sales Qualified Lead (SQL)

rules.fullName: Email Notification to Lead owner when Lead status is SQL
Email Notification to the Lead Owner

rules.description: Lead record type update (C&PS process

rules.fullName: Lead status notification to FSE and Manager
rules.description: Lead status notification to FSE and Manager
rules.formula: AND(ISCHANGED( Status ), OR($RecordType.Name='Lead Convert Layout' , $RecordType.Name='Lead Create Layout',$RecordType.Name='Create C&PS Lead',$RecordType.Name='Convert C&PS Lead'), FSE_Initiator_Name__r.Id != '0051300000BwDly', FSE_Initiator_Name__r.Id != '00530000006rIri', FSE_Initiator_Name__r.Id != '005300000042f5h', OwnerId != '0051300000BwDly', OwnerId != '00530000006rIri' )

rules.fullName: Lead update FSE Initiator Manager Email
rules.description: Lead update FSE Initiator Manager Email

rules.formula: AND( CASE(Status, 'Converted',1, 0)=1, CASE(PRIORVALUE(Status), 'Inquiry',1, 'Engaged',1, 'Marketing Qualified Leads (MQL)',1, 'Sales Accepted Leads (SAL)',1, 'Sales Qualified Lead (SQL)',1, 'Recycle',1, 0)=1 )

AND( CASE(Status, 'Converted - Channel Partner',1, 'Marketing Qualified Leads (MQL)',1, 'Sales Accepted Leads (SAL)',1, 'Sales Qualified Lead (SQL)',1, 'Converted',1, 0)=1, CASE(PRIORVALUE(Status), 'Inquiry',1, 'Engaged',1, 0)=1 )

rules.description: Populate Opportunity SBU with Account SBU, this is to Opportunity RT to AM Standrd if SBU is ATR and to Standard if SBU is D&S

rules.formula: AND( CASE(Status, 'Sales Accepted Leads (SAL)',1, 'Sales Qualified Lead (SQL)',1, 'Converted',1, 0)=1, CASE(PRIORVALUE(Status), 'Inquiry',1, 'Engaged',1, 'Marketing Qualified Leads (MQL)',1, 0)=1 )
AND( CASE(Status, 'Sales Qualified Lead (SQL)',1, 'Converted',1, 0)=1, CASE(PRIORVALUE(Status), 'Inquiry',1, 'Engaged',1, 'Marketing Qualified Leads (MQL)',1, 'Sales Accepted Leads (SAL)',1, 0)=1 )
AND( CASE(Status, 'Marketing Qualified Leads (MQL)',1, 'Sales Accepted Leads (SAL)',1, 'Sales Qualified Lead (SQL)',1, 'Converted',1, 0)=1, CASE(PRIORVALUE(Status), 'Inquiry',1, 'Engaged',1, 0)=1 )

rules.fullName: Send Email to Lead Owner%2C when Lead is Disqualified
rules.description: Send Email to Lead Owner, when Lead is Disqualified

rules.fullName: Send mail to lead owner when Account is populated
rules.description: Send mail to Lead owner when account is added by Salesforce Customer Master

rules.fullName: Send notice on new portal lead
Update Last Modified Global Unsub on Lead
rules.description: This rule is used to update "Last Modified Global Unsubscribe" field on Lead when any of the given criteria is satisfied.
rules.formula: NOT( ISBLANK( Email ) ) && ( ISCHANGED( HasOptedOutOfEmail ) || ISCHANGED( DNS_Reason_Detail__c ) || (ISNEW() && NOT( ISBLANK( DNS_Reason_Detail__c ) )) || (ISNEW() && HasOptedOutOfEmail== true ) )
